title: Tanya Hernandez: "Racial Innocence"
description: In the wake of Latino members of the Los Angeles City Council getting caught on video making racist remarks about the black community, Michael talks with Tanya Kateri Hernandez, author of "Racial Innocence: Unmasking Latino Anti-Black Bias and the Struggle for Equality." Original air date 17 October 2022. The book was published on 23 August 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Tanya Hernandez, Michael Smerconish)
